name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark Ads as Read for Feedly

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can mark as read automatically on Feedly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension marks ads items on Feedly as read automatically.
You can customize target item title prefix by option.
